CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 2, 1955, pg. 28 reads: " Free Prizes, Samples and Demonstrations Galore...15. Walter Pettey of Airway awarding another grand prize, an Airway Sweeper to Mrs. Sylvia Tolliver...Harris Photos"
TitMainTitle: Walter Pettey presenting an Airway Sweeper to Sylvia Tolliver, on stage with Norge Appliances display, in Syria Mosque for the 1955 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Electric apparatus and appliances--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Stages (Platforms)--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Signs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Trade shows--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.Syria Mosque (Pittsburgh, Pa.)
